ctu.nengoros.modules

Interface PeripheralsRegisteringNode

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsynNeuralModule, MultiTerminationNeuralModule, NeuralModule, NeuralModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsAsynNeuralModule, AbsNeuralModule, DefaultAsynNeuralModule, DefaultNeuralModule, MultipleInputNeuralModule, NeuralModuleTest

    public interface PeripheralsRegisteringNode
    This is typically NeuralModule which can create Origin or Termination. This means to register the component into own list peripherals, so the component is called each simulation step = each calling the run(start,stop).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createOrigin(java.lang.String topicName, Origin o)
      This is used by Decoders to add their origin to the NeuralModule, should not be used from any other place.
      void createTermination(java.lang.String topicName, Termination t)
      This is used by Encoders to add their termination to the NeuralModule, should not be used from any other place.

    • Method Detail

      • createOrigin

        void createOrigin(java.lang.String topicName,
                Origin o)
                  throws StructuralException
        This is used by Decoders to add their origin to the NeuralModule, should not be used from any other place.
        Parameters:
        topicName - name of topic (this will be the same with the origin name)
        dec - decoder which sets values of this origin (Decoders implement Origin)
        Throws:
        StructuralException - is thrown if there already is orig. with this name

      • createTermination

        void createTermination(java.lang.String topicName,
                     Termination t)
                       throws StructuralException

        This is used by Encoders to add their termination to the NeuralModule, should not be used from any other place. Data from this termination are read by encoder, encoded into ROS message format and sent to ROS net.

        Parameters:
        topicName - name of the ROS topic (and Nengo termination)
        enc - encoder which sets values (implements Termination)
        Throws:
        StructuralException - is thrown if there already is term. with this name
